column4: Inbound Nicholasville Rd at New Circle Rd
column5: Left turn lane to inner loop New Circle Rd is blocked.
Slow moving traffic, possibly due to heavy rainfall.

column4: The NWS has issued a severe thunderstorm warning for:
Soutwestern Clark Co, east central Jessamine Co, northwestern Madison Co, southeastern Fayette Co until 4:45 p.m.
